types:type.name: peopleData
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type peopleData = {| people: {| person: {| name: String |} |} |} {"example": "{\\\"people\\\":{\\\"person\\\":{\\\"name\\\":\\\"Sumit\\\"}}}"}

types:type.name: fieldsCourse
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type fieldsCourse = {| field1: String, field2: String, field3: String |} {"example": "{\\\"field1\\\":\\\"Mulesoft\\\",\\\"field2\\\":\\\"Course\\\",\\\"field3\\\":\\\"Fundamentals\\\"}"}
